briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate ELX/TEZ/IVA on Cough and Physical Activity in Participants With Cystic Fibrosis (CF)
officialTitle: A Phase 3b Open-label Study Evaluating the Effects of Elexacaftor/Tezacaftor/Ivacaftor on Cough and Physical Activity in Cystic Fibrosis Subjects 12 Years of Age and Older Who Are Heterozygous for the F508del Mutation and a Minimal Function Mutation (F/MF)
summary: This study will evaluate the effects of elexacaftor/tezacaftor/ivacaftor (ELX/TEZ/IVA) on cough and physical activity using wearable technology in CF participants.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Reduction From Baseline in Cough Frequency (Cough Events Per Day) to the Average of Week 8 Through Week 12
